query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NOT NULL AND featuredImage != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_images, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NULL OR featuredImage = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as without_images FROM articles;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mexMZK3NDs3KsAz.c76371ba20f6 --database jH6DLQ8FrZGu3jgVut4Sqk --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NOT NULL AND featuredImage != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_images, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NULL OR featuredImage = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as without_images FROM articles;
